response.overview: n March 2009, hundreds of Britney Spears fans from all over the UK made their way to BBC TV Centre in London for a mass dance tribute to their idol. They weren’t trained dancers, but were put through their paces by a choreographer and by the end of the day were ready to recreate Spears’s video for Hit Me, Baby, One More Time. This documentary concentrates on eleven of the Spears superfans who attended, as we get to know them in their home towns and find out what makes them tick.
response.tagline: A deep-dive into Spears' life, and the fans following her every move.
response.title: Britney Spears Saved My Life
